Review.Titre: Tarbale company
Review.Contenu: The çomuacation is terrible I tried for a week to get a simple washer fixed or replaced. The contractor you had come out sent in all the paperwork needed My representative would not call me back. You are the worst company I have ever worked with....

Review.Titre: I’m left with the feeling that I have been lied to and put off at every turn.
Review.Contenu: I’ve sent a long letter with some receipts to let you know how I feel, but in short I feel that the system got so bogged down, that I couldn’t trust anything told me by either HomeSafe or Armis.

Review.Titre: Not explaining beforehand
Review.Contenu: Not explaining beforehand, the company Policy on claim and being denied payment for a job already  completed and paid for. It should have been handle in a better way. Disappointing. Concern customer.

Review.Titre: ARMIS HOME SAFE ARE RIP OFF
Review.Contenu: They are procrastinators! It took from the middle of September until now to finally pay something to me. 3 months on an AC problem. And I'm still arguing with them about it. Trying to get reimbursement what is fair.  Their BBB rating is negative! They refused to replace anything on my AC unit until I complained. They are still not paying me what the plan says. They say the compressor is out and will replace that. Due to their procrastination I had to get the unit changed. Then they wanted to ask for the old parts. They're gone. I'm terminally ill I can't wait 30-60 days for them to approve the claim. Consequently, my system is the old r22 freon. No one will touch the compressor replacement! At that point you have to change to the new style. They didn't even want to replace the circuit boards that are pitted and burnt! They tried to find out any excuse not to pay up! I'm still trying to get a hold of upper management and I can't! I want to talk to the VP! No make that the CEO. Forgot, they lied to the BBB to get out of stuff! Don't waste your money on them. They now make you pay $120 per call!

Review.Titre: Seems like they don’t understand if you…
Review.Contenu: Seems like they don’t understand if you live outside a city and can’t get someone to drive out and check out your problem then send them a email and wait for a response to fix the problem. Small businesses don’t have this kind of time or resources to send emails and wait for response to fix the problem. I have been paying for this service for years and try to use it and every obstacle they can think of to stop getting it fixed.  I just paid for the service from my pocket.  This Warranty is probably good for someone in a populated area. But if you live away from a populated region you are likely to be on your own.

Review.Titre: It took the adjuster five (5) days to…
Review.Contenu: It took the adjuster five (5) days to approve the replacement of a microwave.  The proposed replacement microwave had less features and the cash offer was $149.00 less than the actual replace cost.

Review.Titre: Was given one contractor ,who has yet…
Review.Contenu: Was given one contractor ,who has yet to call to set ujp appointment.

Review.Titre: Unqualified repair person
Review.Contenu: 4 different things stopped working on my dryer and no matter what I said he kept saying nothing was wrong. But I ended up paying $49 for his inability to do his job.

Review.Titre: After two weeks of waiting for an…
Review.Contenu: After two weeks of waiting for an answer .I called to inquire and the person I spoke to couldn't find my contact information or service information So I just canceled our contract for nonpormance on your part.

Review.Titre: Hard to believe!
Review.Contenu: When I read all the details of their contract which was all on their favor and not much for the customer ie: if they came to fix any of the appliances that appliance became their property….So I cancelled.

Review.Titre: Took my money
Review.Contenu: They drug out. Weekly, the info they needed. After 6 wks, they Denied my claim saying i had rusted coils. My a/c person said that they are using as an excuse, that all a/c units have rusted coils unless they are brand new.  I have recently found out from another Home Warranty Company, that they PAY claims like that everyday.  So, you guys, got my money and stabbed me in the back.

Review.Titre: Not satisfied
Review.Contenu: I used this so that when something happened it would be at least partially paid for. My tech sent pictures of my air conditioner and showed the condition it was in and your company paid NOTHING! I canceled the house part.

Review.Titre: Horrible first experience with…
Review.Contenu: Horrible first experience with HomeSafe.  Their recommended electrician would not deal with HomeSafe.  He said he would repair the problem but I would have to pay him upfront and then worry about being reimbursed by the warranty company.  Then he charged me $750 to replace two circuit breakers!  After weeks of going back and forth with HomeSafe and the electrician, I finally got a check for $226.00.  Homesafe  said it was because the repairs were needed due to weather which is not covered by my warranty.  Yet they agreed to “pay me for parts and labor.”  Well that’s all there was, parts and labor.  Doesn’t make sense.  Then my bank did not honor the check right away, they waited 10 days to deposit the funds into my account because according to Capital One Bank, there was a high risk the check would be not be honored.  Finally I did get the $226.00.

Review.Titre: Armis is the GRAND CHAMPION
Review.Contenu: Armis is the GRAND CHAMPIONOF WAIT TIME FOR THE CUSTOMER AND SERVICE PROVIDER. I DONT BELIEVE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS IN YOUR VOCABULARY. WE TRIED EVERYTHING TO GETINFORMATION TO YOU.  MY SERVICEMAN WORKS FOR A LIVING HE DOESNT HAVE TIME TO BE PUT ON HOLD FOF AN HOUR AND THEN TO SPEAK WITH A PERSON THAT CANT ANSWER QUESTIONS.  WHEN YOU GET TO THE PERSON YOU GIVE INFORMATION TO......IT JUSTWAS INGNORED.  I WAS STANDINGRIGHT THERE, IT WAS ON SPEAKER PHONE.  THE SERVICEMAN GAVE ALL THE SERIAL NUMBERS AND MODEL NUMBER AND THE PROBLEMS AND WHAT THEY NEEDED TO DO.  NOTHING WAS DONE.  THE EXCUSE WAS THEY DIDNT GET A PICTURE OF THE aC unit.  It shows nothing. A picture of a Beautiful AC unit.  I've never seen such trickies to get out of paying forRepairs.  WOW.

Review.Titre: Receipts have not been reimbursed
Review.Contenu: I forwarded receipts for maintenance that was done to appliances in my home 8 Sep 2023. I have not received reimbursement or information on my reimbursement as of yet. I called Home Safe on the day the maintenance was being done and was told to forward the receipts and I would be reimbursed once the receipts were reviewed.

Review.Titre: Coverage for furnace was denied for a…
Review.Contenu: Coverage for furnace was denied for a ridiculous reason.  The heat exchanger had multiple in it. Denied because it rusted.

Review.Titre: horrible service
Review.Contenu: horrible service...no one ever came out to fix my unit.  Take your money and don't care when its time for  a service call

Review.Titre: Have not received a package and nothing…
Review.Contenu: Have not received a package and nothing ordered. All I did was pay our monthly bill. We have not used your services as of yet. Can’t rate you now.

Review.Titre: Home Safe/Armis Very Poor Customer Service!
Review.Contenu: This company. does not have proper protocol in place for follow up.  Between Home Safe & Armis there is not good communication.  It's extremely frustrating as a customer to be told that you can NOT speak to a supervisor.  Home Safe may sell you your contract & take your payment out of your account but after that they really are of no help.  Not only could I not be connected to a supervisor, I was told that the prior person I spoke to works from home so he had no supervisor & the lady I spoke to said, "My supervisor just went home".  The supervisors apparently work for both Home Safe & Car Shield.  When a supervisor finally called me & left a message w/a number to call him back at iit was for Car Shield & the person stated that they could not help me.  I cannot get a straight answer from anyone.  I am so upset & frustrated to be treated this way.  Ive read my contract.  They sure never skip a beat taking out my money each month...but they are not in a hurry to follow up in their so called 24-48 hour period.  This review won't make a difference to this company, (which is sad) but it has helped me to explain my frustrations...hopefully someone will try & help me.  I also have waited a month for $150.00 payment that was to new mailed to me.  Thus far three different time they have gone back an d fourth stating yes, no and now yes they will pay me but no one has called me to get my information.

Review.Titre: The young lady I talked to was…
Review.Contenu: The young lady I talked to was wonderful but dealing with the company was a bad bad experience they wasn't honestly taking care of their my situation so that's why I canceled

Review.Titre: So disappointed in this company
Review.Contenu: So disappointed in this company! I guess being a widow with no help with the contract! I feel very cheated

Review.Titre: Read contract fully
Review.Contenu: Encourage clients to look for your LOOPHOLES in the contract on their covered item.

Review.Titre: Fraudulent Company
Review.Contenu: On my first claim with the company, I had a washing machine that was less than 3 years old. It had an internal seal that failed, allowing water to leak into the transmission, causing the appliance to fail. Home Safe claimed there was rust inside the appliance, as if that would be some kind of neglect on my part, and refused to pay. After dealing with several people and managers in the company, I was eventually able to get them to pay the claim. I should've canceled then, but I foolishly stuck with them.A few months later, my water heater went out. The claim was submitted on a Saturday, and I was able to get the plumber out that same day. I found the plumber, not Home Safe. The estimate was submitted that evening. I received an email asking for more information on Monday, which was promptly responded to and sent in that same day. Their own policy is to approve the claim within 24 to 48 hours. I never heard back from anyone, so I called back several times over the course of the workweek. I was told the adjuster had either left early or had not come into work yet. When the adjuster finally called me on Thursday just before 5 pm, he actually straight up lied to me. He told me that he had requested additional information on Monday after receiving my email. He said he left a voicemail with me and the plumber. Neither one of us had any missed calls from the adjuster. He said he needed to know what caused the tank to rupture and precise pictures of the crack in the tank showing the leak. Anyone who knows anything about a water heater knows that once the tank ruptures, no plumber in their right mind would attempt to disassemble the water heater and repair the leak or determine where exactly it cracked. But that is exactly what the adjuster at Home Safe expected to happen. He said that without a reason why the tank ruptured and precise pictures of the leak location, he could not approve the claim. This is not unlike the power company asking me why did lightning strike the transformer down the street and cause your power outage? Were you able to get pictures of the lightning striking the transformer at that precise moment in time?30 Oct 2023 We have worked out a mutual settlement agreement. The details of which I am not allowed to share.

Review.Titre: To pay claims in a timely fashion and on the spot in an emergency situation!!!@@
Review.Contenu: To pay claims in a timely manner and in a emergency situation prior to 24-48 hrs

Review.Titre: As I said before
Review.Contenu: As I said before, the representative that handled my call was excellent and most helpful but, the fact that I have to wait maybe another week to have my leak in my shower repaired isn’t something I am happy about. I thought I call and explain my problem and I then call a service person to come and fix the problem when he comes, but I have to wait for a estimate from him submitted to your company for approval first is not something that makes me happy. I pay you monthly than another $65. To wait for my  shower to be repaired. When I call for service I am wanting the repairs to be completed at that time and not to make another appointment for service.
